mapper.update: UPDATE member SET birth = #{birth}, email = #{email}, address = #{address}, mobile = #{mobile}, detail_address = #{detailAddress}, post_code = #{postCode} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiry (no, title, content, id, write_date, reply) VALUES (#{no}, #{title}, #{content}, #{id}, #{writeDate}, #{reply})
mapper.select: SELECT BBB.* FROM (SELECT rownum as rn, AAA.* FROM(SELECT * FROM inquiry WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY write_date DESC)AAA)BBB WHERE BBB.rn BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
